response:
$$
\begin{align*}
\_\_ \times 3 \times (9 - 2 \times 4) + 5 & = 17 \\
& \implies \_\_ \times 3 \times (9 - 8) + 5 \\
& \implies \_\_ \times 3 \times 1 + 5 \\
& \implies \_\_ \times 3 + 5 \\
& \implies (\sqrt{16} + 3) - 5 \\
& \implies 4 + 3 - 5 \\
& \implies 7
\end{align*}
$$
The equation that satisfies the given condition is [[7]], as the answer such that 7 is the correct answer according to the rule.
